about_the_game:
《Lamb's Rise: Awaken》is a 3D Roguelike game where you play as a young lamb, leading your fellow villagers to resist a brutal coyote invasion, protect your homeland, and uncover the truth about the world. In battle, you can recruit village allies and invite cosmic heroes to join you, strategically combining characters and skills to unleash powerful awakening abilities.

Through brain-computer interface gameplay, enhance your focus to gain combat buffs. As you progress through the story, you'll unlock new heroes and skills, and strengthen character attributes. Ultimately, you will awaken, rally the world, stop the war, redeem the wolf tribe, and prevent the apocalypse.

Unite the lamb village, battle fierce enemies, and save your homeland—become the Lamb Saint and begin your legendary journey!

Background introduction of cosmic heroes

###Superhero: Chuan

He is from the distant Krypton Protoss, the last descendant of the Kryptonian royal family. After Krypton was corrupted and swallowed by the power of the dark abyss, he wandered between galaxies, looking for the traces of the abyss demons and seeking revenge. He was inspired by the high-dimensional soul of Aries to come to the Aries Planet and fight against the dark abyss forces with the Aries. He entered the battlefield with powerful business skills and political wisdom. His goal is not only to conquer the world, but also to break the enemy's camp through clever means and large-scale diplomatic strategies, win more supporters, and finally rebuild a new peaceful order.

###Silicon Valley Iron Man

He traveled to the ancient Martian advanced technological civilization. After the destruction of the Mars Star Wars civilization, he traveled in the universe on a shuttle and learned the interstellar technology of various civilizations. Later, he became a strong teammate of the superhero: Chuan, and together they fought against the dark abyss demons lurking in the universe to maintain the light and peace of the universe. He led many breakthroughs in the technological world. From electric cars to space exploration, he has changed almost all industries. He also has to use his deep understanding of technology to develop new weapons, equipment and ships to conquer this new universe, and finally realize his dream - to enable humans to not only conquer the earth, but also maintain peace in the galaxy.

###Polar Bear King

The king of the Northern Kingdom of the Sheep Planet leads his people to bravely fight against the wolf tribe that has been blackened by the power of the abyss, and struggles to prevent the dark forces from further eroding the land of the Sheep Planet on the northern this battle across multiple worlds, Vladimir will use his unparalleled leadership and combat skills to lead his army across the battlefield, conquer the enemy, and ultimately restore world peace.

###The Holy King of the West

The high-dimensional ascended masters from outside the universe came to the material universe after multiple dimensional reductions, spreading the wisdom of the Kingdom of God in the universe and committed to building a world of universal harmony. However, the demons of the abyss covet the rich spiritual energy of the universe and constantly sabotage and block the plans of the Western Holy King.

The initial Early Access release includes:

10-15 sheep heroes, each with their own strengths, team up to obtain their soul skills, and freely match skills.

7 superheroes, awakening big moves, full-screen instant monsters, shocking the audience, waiting for you to release.

7 different theme maps, each map is carefully designed based on the plot advancement.

Infinite mode, challenge your operating limits, world ranking, and compete with other players.

3 game modes: normal, difficult, nightmare, different mechanisms, different challenges, very high replayability.

7 deadly sin wolf kings and dozens of elite monsters, unique skill designs and behavior patterns, the combat mechanism is more rich and interesting.

Rewards are scattered throughout the realm, and tasks or challenges are always provided in a game.

More than 100 monsters and dozens of special monster skills make the battle always full of variables.

Game progress update:

1. Sheep Village, battle scenes are re-arranged, and the art quality is improved.

2. Add the main storyline, advance the storyline while fighting, understand the origin of the world crisis and dark forces, resolve the contradictions between the sheep and the wolf, and achieve the century-long reconciliation between sheep and wolves.

3. Add the gameplay of upgrading the buildings in the sheep village, upgrade the sheep village, unlock talents, add the secondary gameplay of cultivation, and improve the cultivation experience.

4. Add up to 7 followers, and the followers' own skills are added to the card pool. The skills can be freely matched to improve the depth of pre-war strategy.

5. UI redo, optimize the model, action, special effects, and improve the art quality.

6. Fix bugs and optimize the detail experience.

7. Add random events in battle, optimize values, and improve the battle experience.

Author's statement:

I was originally a chip engineer. I gave up the life that should have been comfortable, bet all my income and assets, and stepped into an unfamiliar field, just to make a good game that can impress players with my heart, and light up a faint starlight in this dark dawn. I have persisted for 5 years without realizing it. I have experienced so many twists and turns and hesitations. Looking back, it is really a tormenting and lonely journey.

The game is not perfect, but it is all I can do. I am powerless to change the world, I only want to use the remaining light of my life to awaken the spark in the heart of the lamb. Our world is in crisis. Wake up, kind lambs all over the world, unite, and protect your superheroes, who will fight for your freedom. Together, resist the invasion of darkness, prevent wars and disasters from happening again, protect the fire of human civilization, and create a bright and beautiful future for our children and grandchildren!

Remember, freedom is not arbitrary, victory will eventually belong to us!

                                                                                                                    ————Mr.Bai

name: 羔羊崛起：觉醒

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better(x86-64)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATl, Nvidia or Iintel HD
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64bit)
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATl, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: 《Lamb's Rise: Awaken》 is a 3D Roguelike where you play as a young lamb. After a brutal coyote pack invades your peaceful sheep tribe, you must protect your home, uncover the truth, and awaken your powers to stop the war and save the world from apocalypse.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
